Game: Zhu Zhu Pets- Quest for Zhu Come along with Pipsqueak, Mr. Squiggles, Num Nums and Chunk on their quest to find the magical Palace of Zhu! Features • Explore 16 exciting locations from the Snow Mountains to the Amazhu Jungle!• Play 4 exciting mini-games including Vine Swinging and Snowball Throw.• Collect coins, tokens and hidden Zhus to help you unlock new items!• Watch thrilling cut scenes from the movie! <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/082071e0-ae64-4c3e-8215-4125d9b459bf.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/f36c14f6-f752-4df0-87f2-00d89adb0ebb.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/12205cd3-6b79-4f45-b909-03de6c41bf23.png
